com.cloudant.sync.replication
Class ErrorInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.cloudant.sync.replication.ErrorInfo

public class ErrorInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Describes errors which happen during replication, and usually contains any exception thrown in the t field.

See Also:
Replicator, ReplicationListener
